description.ko: 최첨단 내압 기술과 생물 발광 내비게이션 시스템을 탑재한 AQUA-5와 함께 탐험되지 않은 심해의 신비를 경험하세요. 극한의 해저 탐험을 위한 완벽한 솔루션입니다.
description.en: Experience the mystery of the unexplored ocean floor with AQUA-5, featuring advanced pressure-resistant technology and bioluminescent navigation systems for the ultimate deep-sea journey.

prompt: Hyper-realistic cinematic shot of the AQUA-5 deep-sea research vessel navigating through the midnight zone of the ocean, bioluminescent flora and glowing jellyfish illuminating the dark blue abyss, bubbles rising, high-tech metallic finish with glowing cyan accents, 8k resolution, photorealistic textures.
